subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Anthony Kim shot 71 and stands at seven-over-par 217, despite a bout with the howling winds that repeatedly blew his golf ball off the green at the 10th hole.
snippet: Anthony Kim shot 71 and stands at seven-over-par 217, despite a bout with the howling winds that repeatedly blew his golf ball off the green at the 10th hole.
